subtitle: Flavoured butters are great for use in cooking, or spread on thick slices of warmed French bread as nibbles when entertaining.

method.text: Place all ingredients in a food processor and process until well combined.
With slightly dampened hands, form the butter mixture into a long sausage shape. Wrap in dampened parchment paper. Chill for 30 min to harden.

title: Tomato and mustard butter
